price: Lalu Kami utus kepada mereka, seorang rasul dari kalangan mereka sendiri (yang berkata), "Sembahlah Allah oleh kamu sekalian, sekali-kali tidak ada Tuhan selain daripada-Nya.  Maka mengapa kamu tidak bertakwa (kepada-Nya).
arabic: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيهِمۡ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arsalnā fīhim rasūlan min'hum ani uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
